sourceDesc.p: MS Pook & Pook Inc., June 2008; only the ending in CD’s hand (aa), the rest in George Putnam’s.George Washington Putnam (1812-96); recommended to CD by Francis Alexander, to whom CD sat for his portrait on his arrival in Boston (Pilgrim Letters 2, p. 438 & n). Began as CD’s secretary in the United States, Jan 42: see further Pilgrim Letters 3, pp. 26-7 & nn.

dateline.placeName: United States HotelChestnut Street, Philadelphia, where CD arrived 5 Mar.
